import React, {Component} from "react" import SelectFilter from './select' import logo from '../logo.svg' import searchSign from '../search-sign.svg' export default class Header extends Component{ state={ isOpen: false } handleClick = () =>{ this.setState({ isOpen: !this.state.isOpen }) } get SearchComp(){ if (!this.state.isOpen) return null return (
) } render(){ return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{this.SearchComp}
) } }
